document_name: Advocating for MDGs in Albania Project desc..docx
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ALB/00011080/Advocating for MDGs in Albania Project desc..docx

outputs.output_descr: The project works to promote UNDP as an effective partner for development in Albania and a strong player in UN reform and highlight tangible development change made on the ground showcasing the beneficiaries of UNDP interventions. This will be done through a variety of communications channels including: a beneficiary's brochure, press trips to project sites which provided reporters with a valuable opportunity to meet with beneficiaries and gain a deeper insight into the issues that drive UNDP's work in the country. The project also works to support media development in Albania and make extensive use of social media to maximize UNDP audiences.
